name: Unicorn
description: A majestic magical horse with a spiraling horn. Fast and powerful, unicorns can heal allies and their horn attacks dispel enemy magic.

abilities.name: Horn of Dispelling
abilities.description: Attacks automatically dispel one beneficial magic effect from enemies.

abilities.name: Healing Touch
abilities.description: Heals a friendly unit for a significant amount.

abilities.name: Moonlight Blessing
abilities.description: Grants a friendly unit increased movement speed and magic resistance.
